Name: Metronix Lab
About the game: History In a Technology Center, a Super Computer is invaded by hackers known as 'The Public'. They continue to search for Power runes and have control over all local machines, except for one robot (Metronix-47) that has the updated algorithm, preventing hacking by 'The Public', its mission is to recover the runes of Power and disable 'A Hacker Invasion'. Features : Characters with different mechanics. Collectible. Time-Trials.
Developers: Parrot King Games,Bryan Adriel,Ivan Luiz,Lucas Pedrosa,Igor Guanais
